name: finprism
title: FinPrism
desc: A clean and modern SaaS and Startup theme built with Astro.js, Tailwind CSS, and React!
article:
ð Launch your next SaaS or Startup with FinPrism! Built with Astro.js, Tailwind CSS, and React! and also available as a Figma Template. ð¥

Main Features:

  • Built with Latest Astro.js, React, Tailwind CSS and Typescript
  • 80+ Components
  • 3 Landing pages
  • 3 Solutions pages
  • Pricing page
  • 2 Blog pages
  • Tags/Tag page
  • Blog Post page
  • 3 About pages
  • FAQ page
  • Contact page
  • Sign in page
  • Sign up page
  • Password recovery page
  • Terms of Service page
  • Privacy policy page
  • 404 page
  • Markdown and MDX powered blog with pagination
  • Sitemap, RSS feed and robots.txt
  • Easy to Customize
  • Clean, Elegant and Modern Design
  • Fully Responsive & Mobile Friendly
  • SEO Optimized
  • Fast performance
  • Clean folder structure
  • Google fonts
  • Sticky menu
  • Lucide icons
  • Well Documented
